_sText:
mg_piratewars_island

I'm back, bringing a super classic map. Not seeing any good remake of my map (2012 version with islands), I decided to make a little better version for CS:S.

Original Old Piratewars: Solid Snake
2010 Version by tomyg
2012 Version with islands Ayrton09

Features and Changelog:

- New ambient and event sound effects!

- Removed shotgun, instead added grenade with healing and particle effects and new secret with speed power!...Megumin has his island =)

- Custom Skybox from (from Mr.Who).

- Mini map Radar.

Settings:

- if you are going to play this offline make sure to set mp_autokick 0 (for not being kicked!)

- sv_turbophysics 0 (anyways the map has an auto logic to put this settings automatic)

Things you can do in this map:

- Destroy enemy ship and the enemy will have to escape on the boats.

- Rush mid island or enemy ship with knife (yolo)

- Take the Aqua healing grenade, Megumin grenade (and maybe the secret) to take advantage over the enemy.

- Fight boats vs boats after some team destroyed 1 enemy ship.
